import React, {useState} from 'react' import { useFormik } from 'formik' function Authentication() { const [error, setError] = useState(false) return ( <>

{formik.errors.name}

{error&&

{error}

}

Please Log in or Sign up!

{signUp?'Have an account?':'Not a member yet?'}

{signUp&&( <> )}
) } export default Authentication
